fact_check_explanation_title: European countries’ Test and Trace programmes cost much more than €100,000
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Covid-19 tracking apps of countries like Germany and the Netherlands alone cost millions of euros.

fact_check_explanation_title: Disney Christmas show accused of pushing ‘satanic agenda’
fact_check_explanation_summary: Thousands of people have shared claims that a moment from a new Disney+ miniseries reveals a ‘satanic agenda’.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence radiation from AirPods is causing brain tumours
fact_check_explanation_summary: Some scientists have expressed concern over the potential health effects of low-level radiation from mobile devices, but there’s no evidence wireless headphones like AirPods are causing brain tumours.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence midazolam used to kill thousands of patients in April 2020
fact_check_explanation_summary: It is not surprising that prescriptions of a palliative care drug used to make dying people more comfortable increased during one of the worst months of the pandemic.

fact_check_explanation_title: London and Manchester are not ‘minority white’ cities
fact_check_explanation_summary: A tweet from Nigel Farage making the claim has been shared thousands of times.

fact_check_explanation_title: PCR tests aren’t being used to clone humans
fact_check_explanation_summary: There’s no evidence that Covid-19 PCR tests are being used to clone humans. A paper cited to support this theory explores the use of the PCR technique in gene cloning, …

fact_check_explanation_title: Big spending list on Test and Trace and furlough loss needs context
fact_check_explanation_summary: £37 billion was the budget for the first two years, but less was actually spent and the furlough fraud figure is out of date and includes losses from other Covid-19 …

fact_check_explanation_title: M&S is not giving away ‘golden envelopes’ with £750 vouchers on Facebook
fact_check_explanation_summary: A post falsely claims to show a senior member of staff at Marks & Spencer holding golden tickets to win.

fact_check_explanation_title: Long Covid is not really just Covid-19 vaccination side effects
fact_check_explanation_summary: Many sufferers are unvaccinated and evidence suggests vaccination reduces the risk.

fact_check_explanation_title: ‘Wanted’ poster missing context on Test and Trace spending
fact_check_explanation_summary: £37 billion was the budget for Test and Trace, not the spend.

fact_check_explanation_title: Post claiming a lost puppy has been found is fake
fact_check_explanation_summary: The image dates back five years and shows the home of the actual owner.

fact_check_explanation_title: Fake Argos offer still circulating online
fact_check_explanation_summary: An alleged deal promising an airfryer for just £2 is too good to be true.
